</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return a list of all units (all persons except agents) outside and inside vehicles, created on the following sides [[east]], [[west]], [[resistance]]/[[independent]] and [[civilian]] only. Does not contain units of [[sideLogic]]. Dead units and units awaiting for respawn are also excluded. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature_arma3</title><part><name index="1"/><value>To get all units of given side, use <tt>[[units]] [[Side]]</tt>.</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''allUnits''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 


</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>{_x [[setDamage]] 0.5; _x [[groupChat]] "Braaains"} [[forEach]] [[allUnits]];</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value> 

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allPlayers]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[units]], [[vehicles]], [[allUnitsUAV]], [[allCurators]], [[playersNumber]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
